divs: Sighting DetailsMe & my friend were sitting out watching the stars when we spotted a blinking star. No marker lights like a plane and sometimes disappearing for seconds at at time. Flashing at different intensity's and randomness it was crazy to watch and over to soon. Can't help but wonder...wtf!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Mission
There were no other sightings in Mission on or around July 24th 2012
Summary: Flashing very randomly moving at different speeds then suddenly disappearing into mid air.
